mapper.select: select tb_paper.*, tb_user_paper.userScore from tb_paper,tb_user_paper where tb_paper.id in (select paperId userScore from tb_user_paper where userId = #{userId})
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user_paper(paperId, userId, userScore) values(#{param1},${param2},#{param3})
insert into tb_paper(paperName, paperType, paperDegree, singleQueNum, examTime, createDate) values(#{paperName}, #{paperType}, #{paperDegree}, #{singleQueNum}, #{examTime}, #{createDate})
